name: Robox (itch)
description:
Run back and forth as boxes fall from the FACTORY MOTHER in the sky, doing your best to BALANCE your BEAM of REDEMPTION to tip them over into AIRBORNE ESCAPE instead of FIERY DEATH!

Sure, they're just boxes, right? I mean. Sure? Well... no. Not gonna sugarcoat it. There's some super heavy meta narrative going on here.

Or not.
